name: Project: H.A.L.F.
description:
Hello!

Project H.A.L.F. is a climatic FPS game in which you find yourself in a secret laboratory in the year 2026. Your task is to find the way out of it and don't let anyone stop you.

I made this game for my course assignment. It was made in Unreal Engine using C++ with blueprints used for animations and UI. I want to keep working on this project and develop it further so any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Version: 1.0.

Controls:

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Grab

E - Interact/Pick up

F - Heal

R - Reload

Esc/C - Pause
